item.title: Constellation DAGs
item.description: A constellation DAG can be thought of as way to share the thought process that everyone already reasons through before making roadmaps or plans in general. DAG refers to a directed acyclic graph, which is a graph with arrows connecting points on it to indicate direction, and if you follow the arrows you wonâ€™t end up going in a circle. In other words, at every point you don’t need to think about more than the next step.

item.title: Software Release Facts
item.description: In order to improve the quality of software, the Software Release Facts label exposes quality metrics to end consumers such that they can make informed decisions and aligns software vendors’ incentives with making quality software.
